title: Opening Statement
text: Welcome to dataACT, an open data ini­ti­at­ive for the ACT com­munity enabling indi­vidu­als, busi­nesses, journ­al­ists, NGOs and even the pub­lic sec­tor to access, explore and build upon gov­ern­ment datasets in new and innov­at­ive ways.
